titleStmt.title: The King's Majesties gracious letter to his Parliament, conveened at Edinburgh, the twelfth of November, 1673. With his grace the Duke of Lauderdale, his Majesties high commissioner, his speech to the Parliament, after the reading of the letter. By his Majesties special command
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At bottom of p. 5: the 16th day of October 1673.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
